name: admin.conversations.linkObjects
desc: Link a Salesforce record to a channel

channel.desc: Channel ID for Slack channel that will be linked to a Salesforce record.

record_id.desc: Salesforce record ID (15 or 18 digit accepted). See [here](https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000385008&type=1) for how to look up record ID.

salesforce_org_id.desc: Salesforce org ID (15 or 18 digit accepted). See [here](https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000385215&type=1) for how to look up Salesforce org ID.

errors.restricted_action: User does not have access to perform this action.
errors.channel_shared_with_nonapproved_team: Channel is shared with a non-approved external team.
errors.record_channel_already_exists: Record is linked to a different channel.
errors.name_taken: A channel cannot be created with the given name.
errors.not_allowed_for_grid_workspace: Channel type is not allowed for this Enterprise org workspace.
errors.channel_conversion_incomplete: An active channel conversion is preventing linking.
